t: Amazon Drops Venmo App For Payments; How Consumers Will Pay Now – Forbes Advisor
s: March 7, 2025 - Amazon shoppers who pay via their Venmo app will have to find another method very soon. The online retail giant has announced that, beginning January 10, 2024, it will no longer accept Venmo transfers as payment.
